left-color.desc: Color name for left-side background from the Quasar Color Palette

right-color.desc: Color name for right-side background from the Quasar Color Palette

default.desc: This is where item's sections go; Suggestion: QItemSection

left.desc: Emitted when user finished sliding the item to the left

right.desc: Emitted when user finished sliding the item to the right

action.desc: Emitted when user finished sliding the item to either sides
